mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification (id, alarm_type, from_id, to_id, target_id, is_read, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{alarmType}, #{fromId}, #{toId}, #{targetId}, #{isRead}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET is_read = 1, update_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{notiId} AND to_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notification WHERE create_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
